% The vector field

\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
  \frac{d \theta}{d t} & =v\\
  \frac{d v}{d t} & =-\frac{ v b}{ L^{2} m}-\frac{ g \sin(\theta)}{L}\\
\end{split}
\label{eqn:pendulum}
\end{equation}
